paper.title: A Decision Support Approach for Accounts Receivable Risk Management
paper.abstract: Financial disasters in private firms led to increased emphasis on various forms of risk management, to include market risk management, operational risk management, and credit risk management. Financial institutions are motivated by the need to meet increased regulatory requirements for risk measurement and capital reserves. This paper describes and demonstrates a model to support risk management of accounts receivable. We present a decision support model for a large bank enabling assessment of risk of default on the part of loan recipients. A credit scoring model is presented to assess account creditworthiness. Alternative methods of risk measurement for fault detection are compared, and a logistic regression model selected to analyze accounts receivable risk. Accuracy results of this model are presented, enabling accounts receivable managers to confidently apply statistical analysis through data mining to manage their risk.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是开发一个决策支持模型，用于评估贷款接收方的违约风险，并采用信用评分模型和逻辑回归分析应收账款风险。这些内容明确指向信用风险管理的应用，属于金融风险管理的范畴。
